data.event: It was incorporated in 1850, and became a city in 1981.
It was incorporated in 1850, and became a city in 1981.
Harrison Township was established in 1850, formerly part of Crosby Township.

event.title: was built during the earliest years

data.event: Among the historic sites in the city's vicinity is the Eighteen Mile House, which was built during the earliest years of the nineteenth century.

event.title: July 13, 1863, Morgan's Raiders, a Confederate cavalry force, invaded

data.event: On July 13, 1863, Morgan's Raiders, a Confederate cavalry force, invaded.
The first train came to Harrison Township in 1864.
In 1882 Harrison Depot was built at West Broadway and Railroad Avenue.
